data.name: Atlantia Animation
data.detailed_description:
Atlantia is 3D animation software which allows untrained artists to easily and quickly make animated movies. It works at a very high level of abstraction so users can issue "walk here" or "say this" style commands. Users can then spend most of their time focusing on the story, instead of the tedious aspects of animation.

The software includes a growing library of built-in objects and animations. There are text-to-speech capabilities so that users can quickly write dialogue and automate lip-syncing. A custom, high performance inverse kinematics system helps automatically generate dynamic animations and pose characters. The terrain and sky can be easily edited to support many different environments.

All of these things together make it very fun and easy for an average user to make high quality animations. Please give it a try!
data.about_the_game:
Atlantia is 3D animation software which allows untrained artists to easily and quickly make animated movies. It works at a very high level of abstraction so users can issue "walk here" or "say this" style commands. Users can then spend most of their time focusing on the story, instead of the tedious aspects of animation.

The software includes a growing library of built-in objects and animations. There are text-to-speech capabilities so that users can quickly write dialogue and automate lip-syncing. A custom, high performance inverse kinematics system helps automatically generate dynamic animations and pose characters. The terrain and sky can be easily edited to support many different environments.

All of these things together make it very fun and easy for an average user to make high quality animations. Please give it a try!
data.short_description: Atlantia is the world's easiest and fastest animation software. Users can issue "walk here" and "say this" style commands and can easily pose and edit characters and animations. There are also built in lip syncing and text-to-speech capabilities and a system for automatically moving the characters and objects.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Dual core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS Mavericks or later
  • Processor: Dual core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Any Distro
  • Processor: Dual core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

data.legal_notice: Videos produced with the included assets are fully the property of the end user and can be used for any purpose. Assets (audio, 3D models, etc) from other sources may have different restrictions. The software code itself is copyright by Christopher Pollard.
